text: The Ice Age of Dominaria was a period of extreme cold  lasting from 450 AR to 2934 AR, initiated by the Sylex Blast at the end of the Brothers' War , and prolonged by the planeswalkers Leshrac and Tevesh Szat , until Freyalise cast her World Spell to end it. The Ice Age generally referred to in histories is the one from the time of the kingdom of Storgard until the World Spell. The age following is known as The Thaw . Referred to:
